text: Jaba yiniharu mominaharusanga bhetdachanh ta aphu asthavana bha'eko kura gardachan. Ra junabela apasama eka arkala'i bhetdachan, tyatikhera bhandachan ki juna kura allahale timila'i prakata gareko cha, tyo timile tiniharula'i (muslimaharula'i) kina bhanihalchau? Ki (antima dina) tyasaiko sandarbhale timro palanaharako agadi timila'i dosi thahara'inecha ke timi bujhdainau
